评论详情: I ordered these racks for my small kitchen! They were very easy to hang and are sturdy enough to hold seasonings. I hang my oven gloves on the hooks and use the soap dish for dish sponge. They look so modern and are great for a small space. I highly recommend this product.

This shower caddy is a game-changer! It sticks firmly to the wall without any issues, even in a wet environment. The quality is top-notch—durable materials that feel sturdy and long-lasting. It holds all my shower essentials perfectly, and the design is sleek and functional. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable, space-saving solution!

Works like a charm!  Holds firm with a lot of shampoo and conditioner bottles.  Excellent value - I only needed one of the set and would have paid this price for just the one, but I get 5 additional pieces for the same price I was willing to pay for one.
Love the Dove gray color.  Worked super on our ceramic tiles.

I used these shelves as bottle storage on the side of my fridge and I am obsessed with how easy they were to install and how much space it saves me in my small kitchen! I easily placed each shelf and there’s enough shelves in this pack for me to have space for all my baby bottles, toddler cup tops, toddler cup straws, pacis, and our various syringe and cups. They look great and were easy to install, would recommend for anywhere you need shelves.

Please disregard the very lived in aspect of these photos.  But I wanted to show that these shelves work everywhere. Yes my roommate and I use them in the traditional sense of in the bathroom but we also use them in the kitchen to hold our water bottles and whatever else we want off the counter but don't have cabinet space for. I also use the second "soap holder" above my kitchen sink because my dog likes to get on the counter and eat them, this luckily, is just high enough it is out of his reach but also drains perfectly into my kitchen sink!  Super strong and sturdy and I like that you can't really tell the sticker part is there.  Definitely helps keep my space clean and organized!
I’m glad I tried these for myself. It has really helped to organize our families bath products. Put them in the shower, waited 24 hours to “dry”, and they are perfect! Going to buy more!

I absolutely love these! I swear by these. They keep things up, they hold so much, they stick to so many different surfaces, not just for bathrooms. So easy to put up and keeps things right where you need them. And easy to take down to clean.

评论详情: The adhesive sticks on very well to my shower wall and the aesthetic of the baskets are very visually pleasing to the eye. I have an acrylic shower wall with no shelving so this was the perfect option for me and I’m pretty satisfied with the product.

评论概述: A life saver for shower storage...
评论详情: Love these, they have freed up a lot of room in my rather small stall shower so I'm not maneuvering around the larger rack.  I was able to hang one of these pretty high up so I'm not juggling a ton of extra stuff right where I'm at.  It took my wish for more shelving in the shower and upped the ante.  There were enough to hang a couple in one shower and another near the large utility sink in my laundry room.

I bought these caddies for my vanity mirror. I like having my everyday products in view, rather than couped up in the cabinets. I have a large mirror that reaches from wall to wall, so all the space seemed waisted until I installed each caddy. I conveniently have a counter sill between the mirror and the start of the counter, similar to a window sill, that helps bear the weight of the products sitting in the caddies. My husband complimented them, on his own, and is looking to maybe have a similar arrangement for his countertop.  Highly recommend utilizing your empty mirror space for storage :D

This shower caddies are awesome! I split mine up and used them in 2 different showers. They are perfect for organizing all of the products in the shower. They were easy to install, just be sure they are level first. The adhesive is really good, I can use the pumps on my products and it does not budge. They are sturdy and hold a lot of stuff. They are also nice for hanging up shower loofas.

评论概述: Outstanding, hold a lot of weight and pressure
评论详情: I split this between two bathrooms because I already had some shelves along these lines and needed to add more for all the Christmas visitors. I am so impressed with these shelves. I loaded them to the brim - Costco-sized bottles of shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, soap, scrubs, creams, etc. And then we used all this stuff heavily - multiple people pressing those pumps multiple times a day and they have held up without a hitch. Also, super conveniently, the design of these is such that they have little built-in hooks on the sides of the shelves, so you can hang things like sponges, scrubbers, files, even razors (on the soap dish) easily and not have to worry about hooks, etc.

评论概述: Well made, sticks well, durable, look great

They are very durable and sturdy, and hold a lot of product. One of the big ones has 4 heavy shampoos on it, and is still working fine. This 5-pack of adhesive storage shelves are perfect for my shower! I needed some extra room for all my products and these have held up nicely. 评论概述: An excellent solution for organizing your shower essentials.
评论详情: The Veken Adhesive Shower Caddy 6-Pack is an excellent solution for organizing your shower essentials while maintaining a clean and modern bathroom look. The set includes six spacious caddies with a strong adhesive backing, providing ample storage for shampoo bottles, soaps, razors, and other items. Installation is incredibly simple, with no drilling required—just peel, stick, and let the adhesive work its magic. Once installed, the caddies remain firmly in place, even in high-moisture environments.  What sets the Veken Shower Caddies apart is their durability and practicality. Made from rust-resistant materials, these caddies are built to withstand the humid conditions of a bathroom without corroding. The adhesive backing is impressively strong, capable of supporting heavy bottles without losing grip over time. Additionally, the sleek design ensures that the caddies blend seamlessly with various bathroom styles. If you're seeking an affordable, efficient, and stylish way to declutter your shower space, the Veken Adhesive Shower Caddy 6-Pack is a fantastic choice.
